name: Medicines, Allergies, and Intolerances Interoperability Standards
description: To update links to the Wales FHIR® Implementation Guide and introduce an implementation date for legacy systems and recently procured systems that are not yet operational.

name: All Wales Specialist Palliative Care Data Set
description: To introduce the All Wales Specialist Palliative Care Data Set.

name: National Diagnostic Imaging Procedure Codes
description: Introduction of the National Procedure Codes for Diagnostic Imaging.

name: Community Child Health 2000
description: New Dataset for the National Community child Health Database

name: NHS Wales Document Metadata Standard
description: The Document Metadata Data Standard is fundamental to the creation and maintenance of accurate document information. This will also help to enable effective search and retrieval of documents stored within repositories across NHS Wales.

name: Critical Care Data Set
description: The Critical Care Data Set captures all intensive and high dependency care activity regardless of the patient’s area of residence.

name: Single Cancer Pathway
description: All patients suspected of having a new primary cancer will be put on the Single Cancer Pathway regardless of their entry point onto the pathway. This includes patients who have had a previous cancer and are now suspected of having a different primary (a new) cancer

name: SNOMED CT Maturity Matrix
description: Introduction of the SNOMED CT Maturity Matrix, which specifies levels of incorporation of SNOMED CT into a clinical electronic system.
